name: Customers
description: Who are our sales targets and will purchase our offerings?

name: Brand Message
description: How should our brand be perceived in order to sell our offerings?

name: Offerings
description: What combination of products and services do we offer our target groups?

name: Processes
description: Which internal processes do we need to provide in order to create and deliver our offerings?

name: R&D Partner
description: Who are our external partners in order to create our offerings?

name: Jobs to be Done
description: What are our target groups trying to accomplish functional, emotional, or social terms?

name: Pains
description: What constraints do our target groups have to get the job done?

name: Core Values
description: What values do our target groups receive after having experienced our offerings?

name: Gains
description: What unexpected benefits do our target groups have to be excited about their job?

name: Operating Partner
description: Who are our external partners in order to operate and deliver our offerings?

name: Unfair Advantage
description: What do we do better than our competitors and is difficult to copy?

name: Channels
description: Through which channels do we reach our target groups?

name: Resources
description: Which internal resources do we need to provide in order to create and deliver our offerings?

name: Users
description: Who will be using our offerings?

name: Costs
description: How much money do we need to spend to create, operate, and deliver the offerings?

name: Pricing
description: How much, when and how often do we charge our customers?

name: Investments
description: How much money do we need to spend before we earn?
